prompt:
Describe the most common reasons why a person might choose to work from home instead of commuting every day.
A person might decide to work from home for several reasons, such as saving money on transportation costs, reducing exposure to traffic congestion and pollution, improving their work-life balance by having more time to manage personal errands, gaining access to a quieter and more comfortable workspace, or even just enjoying the convenience of being able to work in their pajamas.
